Proxy.label: XML PolyData Reader
Proxy.name: XMLPolyDataReaderCore

Documentation.long_help: Reads serial VTK XML polydata files.
Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML polydata files.

Proxy.Documentation: The XML Polydata reader reads the VTK XML polydata file format. The standard extension is .vtp.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK XML polygonal dataset reader.

StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.label: Time Array
StringVectorProperty.name: TimeArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.

StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which columns to read.

StringVectorProperty.label: Time Array

StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName

StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays

StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the VTK hierarchical box data reader.

StringVectorProperty.label: Time Array
StringVectorProperty.name: TimeArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.

IntVectorProperty.name: DefaultNumberOfLevels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This reader supports demand-driven heavy data reading i.e. downstream pipeline can request specific blocks from the AMR using vtkCompositeDataPipeline::UPDATE_COMPOSITE_INDICES() key in RequestUpdateExtent() pass. However, when down-stream doesn't provide any specific keys, the default behavior can be setup to read at-most N levels by default. The number of levels read can be set using this method. Set this to 0 to imply no limit. Default is 0.

StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which cell-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.label: Time Array
StringVectorProperty.name: TimeArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the Hyper Tree grid reader.

StringVectorProperty.label: Time Array
StringVectorProperty.name: TimeArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets which field data to use as time arrays to read. If set to Default, time steps are incremented integer values starting at zero.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfLevels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets the maximum level to load. Setting it to 1 shows the coarse grid of trees, and setting it at or past maximum level of the data will load the data at finest resolution. When set to a value between (excluded) 1 and the maximum level of the trees, data will be loaded at the required lower resolution, considerably faster.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BoundingBoxByCoordinates
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property sets the bounding box to select HyperTrees. HyperTrees completely included or intersecting with the bounding box will be selected and fully loaded (no partial tree). The 6 fields are coordinates of the bounding box, in the following order: Xmin, Xmax, Ymin, Ymax, Zmin, Zmax.

SourceProxy.label: XML PolyData Reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLPolyDataReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads serial VTK XML polydata files.
Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML polydata files.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Polydata reader reads the VTK XML polydata file format. The standard extension is .vtp. This reader also supports file series.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be in the VTK XML polygonal dataset format. The standard extension is .vtp. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: XML Table Reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLTableReader

Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML table files.

StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be in the VTK XML table format. The standard extension is .vtt. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: XML Hierarchical Box Data reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLHierarchicalBoxDataReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a VTK XML-based data file containing a hierarchical dataset containing vtkUniformGrids.
Documentation.short_help: Read a VTK data file containing a hierarchical box dataset.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Hierarchical Box Data reader reads VTK's XML-based file format containing a vtkHierarchicalBoxDataSet. The expected file extensions is either .vthb or .vth.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be in the VTK XML polygonal dataset format. The standard extension is .vtp. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: XML UniformGrid AMR Reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLUniformGridAMRReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a VTK XML-based data file containing a AMR datasets .
Documentation.short_help: Read a VTK data file containing AMR dataset.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This reader reads Overlapping and Non-Overlapping AMR datasets in VTK XML format. This reader reads the newer version of the format. For version 1.0 and less, use XMLHierarchicalBoxDataReader. The expected file extensions is either .vthb or .vth.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be in the VTK XML polygonal dataset format. The standard extension is .vtp. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

Documentation.long_help: Reads HyperTreeGrid .htg files
Documentation.short_help: Reads HyperTreeGrid data

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader.

SourceProxy.name: XMLPHyperTreeGridReader

If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: XML MultiBlock Data Reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLMultiBlockDataReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a VTK XML multiblock data file and the serial VTK XML data files to which it points.
Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML multiblock datasets.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Multiblock Data reader reads the VTK XML multiblock data file format. XML multiblock data files are meta-files that point to a list of serial VTK XML files. When reading in parallel, this reader will distribute sub-blocks among processors. The expected file extensions are .vtm and .vtmb.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. Each file is expected to be in the VTK XML polygonal dataset format. The standard extension is .vtp. If more than one file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide one file per time step.

SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Dataset Reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLPartitionedDataSetReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a VTK XML partitioned dataset file and the serial VTK XML data files to which it points.
Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML partitioned datasets.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Dataset reader reads the VTK XML Partitioned Dataset file format. XML partitioned dataset files are meta-files that point to a list of serial VTK XML files. When reading in parallel, this reader will distribute sub-blocks among processors. The expected file extensions are .vtpd.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader.

SourceProxy.label: XML Partitioned Dataset Collection Reader
SourceProxy.name: XMLPartitionedDataSetCollectionReader

Documentation.long_help: Reads a VTK XML partitioned dataset collection file and the serial VTK XML data files to which it points.
Documentation.short_help: Read VTK XML partitioned datasets.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The XML Partitioned Dataset Collection reader reads the VTK XML Partitioned Dataset Collection file format. XML partitioned dataset collection files are meta-files that point to a list of serial VTK XML files. When reading in parallel, this reader will distribute sub-blocks among processors. The expected file extensions are .vtpc.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader.
